name: Night Bomber
description:
Fly as low as you dare to bomb the enemy missiles and collect the medals. The more medals you collect the greater the bomber pilot you are!
The controls are simple, in fact that couldn't be simpler. Just tap the screen to simultaneously swoop down low and drop your bombs.
No annoying adverts, no annoying in-app purchasing, just endless arcade thrills for the price of a loaf of bread.
